subsection_name: giun-xoan.json_6_Factors that increase the risk of disease
subsection_content:
People traveling or living in endemic environments where trichinosis is endemic.
People who have the habit of eating pork blood pudding, undercooked pork, eating salads, undercooked dishes... from undercooked pork have pathogens.
